Package payroll

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
payroll.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a controller that helps implement the MVC model for pa. The controller is responsible for controlling the way that a user interacts with our payroll processing application
Author:
Christopher Nguyen, Toshanraju Vysyaraju

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Method used to initialize values for the department, employment, and management choice boxes.

    • importFile

      void importFile​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method used to import a text file into the employee database.
      Parameters:
      event - action event passed when import button is pressed to call importFile method

    • exportFile

      void exportFile​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method used to export information from the employee database into a new file.
      Parameters:
      event - action event passed when export button is pressed to call exportFile method

    • resetTab

      public void resetTab​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to reset the fields to the default value.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event passed when reset button is pressed to reset the fields on the GUI

    • handleEmploymentRestrictions

      public void handleEmploymentRestrictions​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the restrictions on the text fields and choice boxes based on what employee type is chosen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event passed when a employee type is pressed to disable or enable restrictions on the GUI

    • checkFieldDouble

      public int checkFieldDouble()
      Helper method used to verify the data passed into text fields to check if it is a valid numerical value.
      Returns:
      an integer value stating whether the input is valid and verifies what employee type it is based off the input

    • handleClickAdd

      public void handleClickAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the process when the add button is pressed. If the input is valid, it will add the employee or return the proper response based on the input given
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when add button is pressed to call this method to handle adding a employee.

    • handleClickPrint

      public void handleClickPrint​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle printing employee information from company into the text area on the GUI.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when print button is pressed to print employee information from company.

    • handleClickPrintbyDept

      public void handleClickPrintbyDept​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle printing employee information from company into the text area on the GUI sorted by department.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when print button is pressed to print employee information sorted by department from the company.

    • handleClickPrintbyDate

      public void handleClickPrintbyDate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle printing employee information from company into the text area on the GUI sorted by date.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when print button is pressed to print employee information sorted by date from the company.

    • handleClickRemove

      public void handleClickRemove​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the process when the remove button is pressed. If the input is valid and the employee exists, it will remove the employee otherwise it will return a proper response based on the given input.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when remove button is pressed to call this method to handle removing a employee.

    • handleClickSetHours

      public void handleClickSetHours​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the process when the set hours button is pressed. If the input is valid, it will add the employee's hours or will return a appropriate response based on given input
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when set hours button is pressed to call this method to handle setting the hours for a employee

    • handleCalcPay

      public void handleCalcPay​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the process of calculating an employee's payment. If the database is not empty, it will calculate the proper payment for each employee in the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - passed when calculate payment button is pressed to call this method to handle calculating the payment for each employee in the company database.
